name: Smoke Test - Datewise Filter and Dashboard Card Navigation
description:
This test verifies that a user can apply various filters on the HR Dashboard 
(Datewise, Monthly, HR, Employee, Today) and that all dashboard cards navigate correctly.
descriptionHtml:
This test verifies that a user can apply various filters on the HR Dashboard
(Datewise, Monthly, HR, Employee, Today) and that all dashboard cards navigate correctly.

labels.name: story
labels.value: HR user filters and views dashboard by Date, Month, HR, and Employee
